com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory.types

Interface WigetContainerBindingDef

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WigetContainerBindingDefImpl

    public interface WigetContainerBindingDef
    Wiget container bindings define a wiget contained in a container of a wiget assembly or bind a container of the template to a container of an assembled wiget
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TypeDef containedWiget() 
      AssembledWigetDef containedWigetAssembly() 
      java.lang.String fromAssembledWigetParameterAlias() 
      java.lang.String fromTemplateContainerAlias() 
      java.lang.String inContainerAlias() 
      boolean isBoundToAssembledWiget() 

    • Method Detail

      • inContainerAlias

        java.lang.String inContainerAlias()
        Returns:
        The alias of the container in which the wiget is contained or to which the template container is bound

      • containedWiget

        TypeDef containedWiget()
        Returns:
        If the container binding is binding an assembled wiget then this is the type defining the contained wiget

      • isBoundToAssembledWiget

        boolean isBoundToAssembledWiget()
        Returns:
        True if this container binding is binding an assembled wiget

      • fromAssembledWigetParameterAlias

        java.lang.String fromAssembledWigetParameterAlias()
        Returns:
        If this container binding is binding an assembled wiget then this is the alias of the parameter on the parent assembled wiget that supplies the data source value for the contained wiget. If this parameter returns a collection then the wiget is repeated for each element in the collection

      • fromTemplateContainerAlias

        java.lang.String fromTemplateContainerAlias()
        Returns:
        If this container binding is NOT binding an assembled wiget then this is the alias of the container of the template whose contents are bound to the target container

      • containedWigetAssembly

        AssembledWigetDef containedWigetAssembly()
        Returns:
        The defintion of the assembled wiget contained if this binding in binding an assembled wiget
